page.title: 16Bugley Court Farm.
page.content: Philip and Richard visited Mr and Mrs Lewis who live in a modernised two hundred year old farmhouse.There is a copse which is left for wildlife, we saw as grey squirrel and a partridge. All around the farm was electric fencing so we tried not to touch it. They have 14 horses, 2 Jersey house cows as well as calves and cattle they look after.They use some of the milk themselves and the rest is for the calves and the two farm cats.Pauline has worked for Mr Lewis for many years and trains the horses for eventing and dressage.This year one of their horses won second at the Bath and West Show. Their chickens used to be free range but now they have a fenced in place because a fox had some.
